    1: from pandas import Index
    2: import pandas._testing as tm
    3: 
    4: 
    5: def test_pickle_preserves_object_dtype():
    6:     # GH#43188, GH#43155 don't infer numeric dtype
    7:     index = Index([1, 2, 3], dtype=object)
    8: 
    9:     result = tm.round_trip_pickle(index)
   10:     assert result.dtype == object
   11:     tm.assert_index_equal(index, result)
